string.name: q
string.value: The weakest monster in MapleStory is the BLUE SNAIL.

string.name: d
string.value: The weakest monster is the GREEN SNAIL. (LV. 1)

string.name: q
string.value: The most powerful monster in MapleStory is the JR. BALROG.

string.name: d
string.value: Currently the most powerful monster is the CRIMSON BALROG.

string.name: q
string.value: RED SNAILS can only be found at the Maple Island, where the beginners play.

string.name: d
string.value: There's quite a lot of them at Victoria Island, too.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll occasionaly obtain [Pig Tail] after defeating the PIG.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll occasionally obtain [Pig Head].

string.name: q
string.value: You'll obtain [Blue Ribbon] by defeating the RIBBONED PIG.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll obtain [Red Ribbon].

string.name: q
string.value: The weakest among the mushrooms is the ORANGE MUSHROOM.

string.name: d
string.value: The weakest among the mushrooms is the SPORE. (LV. 2)

string.name: q
string.value: You'll obtain [Lupin's Doll] by defeating the cute monkey monster called LUPIN.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll obtain Lupin's Doll, banana, and others.

string.name: q
string.value: DRAKE is a monster that lives deep in the Dungeon. You'll occasionally obtain [Drake's Toenail] by defeating it.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll obtain [Drake's Skin].

string.name: q
string.value: When you defeat the PIG, WILD BOAR, or the HORNED MUSHROOM, you'll obtain [leather].

string.name: d
string.value: HORNED MUSHROOM does not provide [leather].

string.name: q
string.value: The slimes you'll see often at the beginner's map or around Ellinia are the BLUE SLIMES.

string.name: d
string.value: At the beginner's map, you'll see the GREEN SLIMES.

string.name: q
string.value: The GREEN MUSHROOM that you'll see often around the field, forrest, or the construction site has a grey horn on its cap.

string.name: d
string.value: GREEN MUSHROOMS do not have horns.

string.name: q
string.value: The WILD CARGO that lives deep in the Dungeon is very adept at attacking both up-close and long-range.

string.name: d
string.value: WILD CARGO only attacks up-close.

string.name: q
string.value: EVIL EYE, CURSE EYE, and COLD EYE all look similar, but only EVIL EYE has two eyes.

string.name: d
string.value: They all have one eye.

string.name: q
string.value: The LIGATORS that live around the swamps look a lot like spiders.

string.name: d
string.value: They resemble alligators.

string.name: q
string.value: The WILD CARGO that live deep in the Dungeon is the mutant version of a cat with a single horn at the center of its head.

string.name: d
string.value: WILD CARGO has 2 huge horns.

string.name: q
string.value: The JR. BALROG that lives in the cursed altar is a LV. 80 monster.

string.name: d
string.value: JR. BALROG is a LV. 80 monster.

string.name: q
string.value: The fastest monster in MapleStory is the STONE GOLLEM.

string.name: d
string.value: STONE GOLLEM and DARK STONE GOLLEM is considered the slowest monsters in the game.

string.name: q
string.value: The nasty ZOMBIE LUPIN's are made of black magic and the cursed doll through Grendel the Really Old.

string.name: d
string.value: It's a monster made out of Grendel the Really Old's black magic.

string.name: q
string.value: MUSHMOM, a humongous mushroom monster, is basically a giant version of the ORANGE MUSHROOM.

string.name: d
string.value: MUSHMOM is a giant version of the ORANGE MUSHROOM.

string.name: q
string.value: BUBBLINGS that reside in subways attack by firing bubbles from long range.

string.name: d
string.value: BUBBLINGS only attack up-close.

string.name: q
string.value: STIRGE, a flying monster, usually flies around for a long time, and then takes a break by hanging on the ceiling.

string.name: d
string.value: They never stop flying.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll obtain [Jr. Necki's Skin] by defeating the JR. NECKI, and when eaten, you'll recover some of your MP.

string.name: d
string.value: [Jr. Necki's Skin] is not edible.

string.name: q
string.value: JR. WRAITH, a monster that resembles ghost, occasionally offers a [Blue Tablecloth].

string.name: d
string.value: They only offer [White Tablecloth].

string.name: q
string.value: LORANG, a crab-resembling monster around Florina Beach, occasionally attacks while jumping.

string.name: d
string.value: They do resemble crabs, but they do attack while jumping, too.

string.name: q
string.value: LORANG, a crab-resembling monster, digs the sand and hides in there if they are near death.

string.name: d
string.value: They'll fight til they die. (Bravo...)

string.name: q
string.value: UMTI, the monster that resembles a sea turtle, usually attacks long-range with force.

string.name: d
string.value: UMTI's attack long-range.

string.name: q
string.value: [Iron Hog's Metal Hoof] is obtainable through IRON HOG, a metal armor-dressed monster that resembles a horse.

string.name: d
string.value: IRON HOG is a pig.

string.name: q
string.value: [Medicine with Weird Vibes], an item given by Wraith, will make you really feel weird if consumed.

string.name: d
string.value: [Medicine with Weird Vibes] cannot be consumed.

string.name: q
string.value: MALADY, a monster that flies around with the broom, fires away laser beams from far out.

string.name: d
string.value: MALADY only attacks up-close.

string.name: q
string.value: RED DRAKE is the only Drake that attacks long-range.

string.name: d
string.value: RED DRAKE attacks long-range with force.

string.name: q
string.value: CROKO, which lives around swamps, is higher leveled than COPPER DRAKE.

string.name: d
string.value: CROKO is LV. 52, and COPPER DRAKE is LV. 45.

string.name: q
string.value: COPPER DRAKE can be found near Perion, and is known for attacking from long-range.

string.name: d
string.value: It only attacks from up-close.

string.name: q
string.value: Every monster from El Nath is weak against fire-based attacks.

string.name: d
string.value: DARK YETI and DARK PEPE are weak against religious attacks.

string.name: q
string.value: JR. YETI and the Transforming JR. YETI have the same level and HP.

string.name: d
string.value: They are both LV. 50 with HP 3700.

string.name: q
string.value: CRIMSON BALROG, LV 100, does not get poisoned from posion-based attacks.

string.name: d
string.value: It cancels out poison-based attacks, but is vulnerable against religious attacks.

string.name: q
string.value: MALADY, the monster flying around in broom, is an undead monster.

string.name: d
string.value: It's weak against religious attacks, but is NOT an undead monster.

string.name: q
string.value: The monsters that offer [Stiff Feather] are HECTOR, DARK YETI, and LYCANTHROPE.

string.name: d
string.value: HECTOR, DARK YETI, and LYCANTHROPE offer [Stiff Feather].

string.name: q
string.value: The monsters that offer [Soft Feather] are YETI, JR. YETI, WHITE FANG, LYCANTHROPE, AND LUPIN.

string.name: d
string.value: LUPIN offers [Stiff Feather].

string.name: q
string.value: AXE STUMP is a monster borne of rage towards a lumberjack that forgot to take off the axe from the tree.

string.name: d
string.value: There's a legend where AXE STUMP is a monster borne of rage towards a lumberjack that forgot to take off the axe from the tree.

string.name: q
string.value: WEREWOLF summons its other self to attack.

string.name: d
string.value: WEREWOLF does not have its other self.

string.name: q
string.value: NEPENDEATH and DARK NEPENDEATH are the only monsters that do not move around.

string.name: d
string.value: NEPENDEATH does not move around and attack.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll need 15 tree branches to make 1 Processed Wood.

string.name: d
string.value: 10 tree branches is enough.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll make a set of screws, 15 screws in total, with a Bronze Plate and a Steel Plate.

string.name: d
string.value: Screws are useful for making or upgrading items.

string.name: q
string.value: Fusion Mace, a one-handed blunt weapon, is only available to Warriors and Magicians.

string.name: d
string.value: It's only available to Warriors and Magicians.

string.name: q
string.value: Mace, a one-handed blunt weapon, is only available to Warriors and Magicians.

string.name: d
string.value: Mace is only available to Warriors and Magicians.

string.name: q
string.value: Long Sword, a one-handed sword, is available to everyone BUT the beginners.

string.name: d
string.value: Beginners can use it, too.

string.name: q
string.value: Balanche, a weapon for Bowman sold at Henesys, has an item option of STR + 2 attached to it.

string.name: d
string.value: Balanche has an item option of STR + 1 attached to it.

string.name: q
string.value: The One-side Only Earring is available through stores, but NOT the Amethyst Earring.

string.name: d
string.value: Amethyst Earring can be purchased at the Henesys Department Store.

string.name: q
string.value: The Blue Whitebottom Shoes that can be worn from LV. 26 on, is available to everyone, including the beginners.

string.name: d
string.value: It is available to everyone.

string.name: q
string.value: The Armor Scroll consists of two types - the one for DEF, and the one for HP.

string.name: d
string.value: You can check through the Perion Department Store.

string.name: q
string.value: When purchasing a 100% scroll at the store, the scroll for two-handed weapon is more expensive than the one for one-handed weapon.

string.name: d
string.value: The price for the scrolls for both the two-handed or one-handed weapon are the same.

string.name: q
string.value: The weapon store at Ellinia only sells scrolls for Staff and Wand.

string.name: d
string.value: The scrolls for earrings are also available.

string.name: q
string.value: The weapon store at Lith Harbor is the only place without the Subi Throwing-Star.

string.name: d
string.value: The Subi Throwing-Star is also available at Lith Harbor.

string.name: q
string.value: The Stolen Fence is only available at Lith Harbor.

string.name: d
string.value: The Square Wooden Shield is available at Lith Harbor.

string.name: q
string.value: The item options for the White & Black Korean Rubber Shoes are diferent.

string.name: d
string.value: The colors are different, but the options are the same.

string.name: q
string.value: If you use the 100% Scroll for Claw for ATT, then the ATT will be +1, as will be the accuracy.

string.name: d
string.value: Only the ATT goes up by 1. The accuracy stays the same.

string.name: q
string.value: A single item slot can hold upto 100 ores of same kind at once.

string.name: d
string.value: The ores can be stored up to 100 per slot.

string.name: q
string.value: The item that's dropped onto the field will not disappear, even after a long period of time.

string.name: d
string.value: It disappears after a certain amount of time.

string.name: q
string.value: To make the Mithril Tower Shield, you'll need Steel Tower Shield, 10 Mithril Plates, and 50,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: Not 50,000 mesos, but 100,000 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: To make the Moon Rock, you'll need to take the a Plate of Mithril, Steel, Bronze, Adamantium, Silver, Orihalcon, and Gold each at Arwen the Fairy.

string.name: d
string.value: You also need 10,000 mesos along with the items.

string.name: q
string.value: To make the Mithril Brist, you'll need Steel Brist, 5 Mithril Plates, and 55,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: Mr. Smith of Perion makes it.

string.name: q
string.value: Steel Pride, a hat for Magicians, has the item option of INT + 1 and LUK + 1

string.name: d
string.value: Only INT + 1 is available.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Steel Trigger, which can be worn at LV. 30 for Warriors, you'll need 30 pieces of Drake's Skin.

string.name: d
string.value: It'll take 30 leathers and 20 pieces of Drake's Skin.

string.name: q
string.value: Green Jack Boots, which is available for Bowman over LV. 25, has the item option of DEX + 2

string.name: d
string.value: An option of DEX + 1 is attached to it.

string.name: q
string.value: Blue White-Lined Boots, which is available for thieves over LV. 35, has the item option of LUK + 1 and DEX + 1.

string.name: d
string.value: It's available through Chrishrama of Sleepywood.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Metal Koif, a helmet for Warriors, you'll need a Bronze Koif, a Steel Plate, and 500 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: Mr. Thunder of Perion makes it.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Green Diros, a glove for Bowman, you'll need Red Diros as one of the materials.

string.name: d
string.value: Not Red Diros, but Blue Diros.

string.name: q
string.value: To make the Basic Archer Glove, you'll need 20 leathers.

string.name: d
string.value: To make the Basic Archer Glove, you'll need 15 leathers.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Work Glove, a glove for thieves, you'll need 20 leathers and 1,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: You need 15 leathers and 1,000 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Dark Wolfskin, a Thief glove, you'll need Steel Wolfskin as one of the materials.

string.name: d
string.value: Not Steel Wolfskin, but Bronze Wolfskin.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Steel Titans, a claw for thieves, you'll need 5 screws as one of the materials.

string.name: d
string.value: JM from tha Streetz of Kerning City makes it.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Steel Igor, a claw for thieves, you'll need Bronze Igor, 2 Steel Plates, and 3,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: JM from tha Streetz of Kerning City makes it.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Red Lutia, a glove for Magicians, you'll need 60 leathers.

string.name: d
string.value: Francois of Ellinia makes it.

string.name: q
string.value: Dark Arten, a glove for Magicians, has the item option of INT + 2 and LUK + 1.

string.name: d
string.value: The only option attached to it is INT + 3.

string.name: q
string.value: The level limit for Juno, a glove for Warriors, is 15.

string.name: d
string.value: The level limit is 10.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Yellow Briggon, a glove for Warriors, you'll need 2 Topaz's.

string.name: d
string.value: Not 2, but 3 Topaz's

string.name: q
string.value: All weapons that can be used by everyone are only limited by levels, not stats.

string.name: d
string.value: There are weapons that are affected by the stats.

string.name: q
string.value: To make Bronze Husk, a glove for Warriors, you'll need 2 Power Crystals as one of the materials.

string.name: d
string.value: An option of STR + 2 is attached to it.

string.name: q
string.value: Snowshoes, which enables you not to slip through snow, is available to everyone with the level limit of 30.

string.name: d
string.value: The boots differ from different jobs.

string.name: q
string.value: To make a crossbow called Rower, you'll need 45 screws.

string.name: d
string.value: You need 40 screws.

string.name: q
string.value: The most expensive one to refine is the Star Rock.

string.name: d
string.value: The most expensive one to refine is Dark Crystal, which will cost you 50,000 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: At the Repair Shop, you'll be able to acquire a Steel Plate with 100 pieces of Iron Hog's Metal Hoof and 1,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: The Repair Shop is at Kerning City.

string.name: q
string.value: The Bronze Arrows and Steel Arrows are available through Vicious of Henesys.

string.name: d
string.value: Vicious only makes Bronze Arrows.

string.name: q
string.value: You get 5 mesos for selling one Mushroom Spore.

string.name: d
string.value: You get 3 mesos for selling one Mushroom Spore.

string.name: q
string.value: Slime Bubble costs more than the Squishy Liquid.

string.name: d
string.value: Slime Bubble DOES cost more than the Squishy Liquid.

string.name: q
string.value: You get 100 mesos for selling 1 ore of Bronze.

string.name: d
string.value: You get 100 mesos for selling 1 ore of Bronze.

string.name: q
string.value: Drake's Skull from Red Drake costs more than the Drake's Skull of other Drakes.

string.name: d
string.value: They all cost the same.

string.name: q
string.value: To refine one Black Crystal, it'll cost you 3,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: It costs 3,000 mesos to refine a black crystal.

string.name: q
string.value: You get 8 mesos for selling one Orange Mushroom Cap.

string.name: d
string.value: You get 4 mesos for selling one Orange Mushroom Cap.

string.name: q
string.value: You get 50 mesos for selling 10 tree branches.

string.name: d
string.value: You get 4 mesos for selling 1 tree branch.

string.name: q
string.value: You get 300 mesos for selling 3 leathers.

string.name: d
string.value: You get 100 mesos for selling 1 leather.

string.name: q
string.value: The price of 10 ores of Gold and one Gold Plate is of same price.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll get 3,000 mesos for selling 10 ores of Gold, 1,200 mesos for a Gold Plate.

string.name: q
string.value: The most expensive Return Scroll is the one to Sleepywood.

string.name: d
string.value: The Return Scroll : Sleepywood costs 600 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Sell 5 of Malady's Experiemental Frogs, buy Arrows for Bow, sell them back to the store, and you'll get 300 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: You don't get anything for selling arrows at the store. Doesn't that blow?

string.name: q
string.value: To purchase [Old Wisconsin], you'll need 3,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: [Old Wisconsin] is available through the weapon store at Henesys.

string.name: q
string.value: If you purchase Arrow for Bow at the store, it'll cost you 1 meso per arrow, but you won’t be able to sell the arrows for any money.

string.name: d
string.value: Arrow for Bow and Crossbow will not get you any money for selling them at the store.

string.name: q
string.value: The Watermelon at MapleStory costs 3,100 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: It costs 3,200 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The Red Bean Sundae at MapleStory costs 4,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: You can buy it from an NPC for 4,000 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The Ice Cream Suckers at MapleStory costs 2,100 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: It costs 2,300 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The price of 150 Huge Bubbles of Bubbling is LOWER than 200 Slime Bubbles.

string.name: d
string.value: 200 Slime Bubbles : 10,000 mesos. 150 Huge Bubbles of Bubbling : 1,500 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The price of Jr. Neck Skin and Stirge Wing is the same.

string.name: d
string.value: They both go for 12 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The price of 2 Jr. Necki skins is LOWER than 1 Ligator skin.

string.name: d
string.value: 2 Jr. Neck Skins = 24 mesos. 1 Ligator Skin = 25 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Sell 10 Tablecloths from Jr. Wraith, and you'll be able to buy a Lemon with it.

string.name: d
string.value: Lemon costs 305 mesos, so you'll be short of 5 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: 1 Lorang Claw has the same price as 1 Cold Eye Tail.

string.name: d
string.value: Lorang Claw = 32 mesos. Cold Eye Tail = 35 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: 1 Clang Claw has the same price as the price of 5 Blue Mushroom Caps.

string.name: d
string.value: Clang Claw = 60 mesos. Blue Mushroom Cap = 12.

string.name: q
string.value: The price of Umti Shell and Slime Bubble is the same.

string.name: d
string.value: They both go for 50 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: If you sell 100 pieces of Iron Hog's Metal Hoof, you'll be able to buy a Dark Moon Conehat.

string.name: d
string.value: 100 pieces of Iron Hog's Metal Hoof = 3,800 mesos. Yes, you can buy Dark Moon Conehat with that.

string.name: q
string.value: The Medicine with Weird Vibes from Wraith will go for the same price as 1 Processed Wood.

string.name: d
string.value: Medicine with Weird Vibes = 50 mesos. Processed Wood = 20 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The price of 128 pieces of Croko Skin is 6,500 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: If you sell 10 Pig Ribbons to the store, you can buy a Red Potion with those mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: 10 Pig Ribbons = 50 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: A Mushmom Spore has the same price as a Tauromacis Horn.

string.name: d
string.value: They both go for 100 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: If you sell the Star Rock at the store, you'll get 10,000 mesos per.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll get 10,000 mesos per Star Rock.

string.name: q
string.value: If you sell 2 Red Snail Shells, 2 Pig Heads, and 1 Slime Bubble at the store, you'll get 140 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll get 30+60+50=140 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Both the Yellow Umbrella and the Sky-Blue Umbrella will get you 1 meso if you sell them at the stores.

string.name: d
string.value: 1 meso for Sky-Blue Umbrella, but 50,000 mesos for Yellow Umbrella.

string.name: q
string.value: It costs the same whereever in MapleStory to refine the ores.

string.name: d
string.value: It's a little bit cheaper at Kerning City.

string.name: q
string.value: If you sell your screws at the store, it'll fetch you 100 mesos per screw.

string.name: d
string.value: It goes fo 50 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Red Potion increases the HP by 100.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the HP by 50.

string.name: q
string.value: Lemon increases the MP by 150.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the MP by 150.

string.name: q
string.value: The Warrior Potion increases the Weapon ATT by 10 for 3 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the Weapon ATT by 5 for 3 min.

string.name: q
string.value: Blue Potion is 8 mesos cheaper at the Ellinia Department Store than other places.

string.name: d
string.value: The Blue Potion is cheaper in Ellinia Department Store.

string.name: q
string.value: If you take the Orange Potion, it'll improve your HP by 150, and it costs 150 mesos at stores.

string.name: d
string.value: It costs 160 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The Speed Potion will increase your speed for 5 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the speed for 3 min.

string.name: q
string.value: The Wizard Potion will increase your Magic ATT by 10 for 5 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the Magic ATT by 5 for 3 min.

string.name: q
string.value: The Sap of an Ancient Tree will increase your Magic ATT by 10 for 5 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the Magic ATT by 10 for 5 min.

string.name: q
string.value: The Drake's Meat will increase your Weapon DEF by 10 for 3 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the Weapon DEF by 10 for 3 min.

string.name: q
string.value: Drake's Blood will increase your Weapon ATT by 10 for 5 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the Weapon ATT by 8 for 5 min.

string.name: q
string.value: Take one Power Elixir, and it'll restore your HP and MP back to 100%.

string.name: d
string.value: Power Elixir recovers all HP and MP.

string.name: q
string.value: Meat can be bought at stores for 106 mesos, and it recovers HP 100.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the HP by 100.

string.name: q
string.value: Sniper Potion will increase your accuracy by 5 for 5 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases accuracy by 5 for 5 min.

string.name: q
string.value: Pizza costs 420 mesos, and one slice will recover HP 400.

string.name: d
string.value: Pizza costs 450 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Cake costs 320 mesos, and one piece will recover HP 100 and MP 100.

string.name: d
string.value: Check the 24 Hr Mobile Store

string.name: q
string.value: The Pure Water that can be purchased at 24 Hr Mobile Store costs 1600 mesos and recovers MP 800.

string.name: d
string.value: The Pure Water that can be purchased at 24 Hr Mobile Store costs 1650 mesos

string.name: q
string.value: Hot Dog costs 320 mesos and one will recover HP 300.

string.name: d
string.value: Check the 24 Hr Mobile Store

string.name: q
string.value: Hamburger costs 430 mesos and one will recover HP 400.

string.name: d
string.value: Hamburger costs 450 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll get 2,750 mesos from the stores if you sell your Power Elixir.

string.name: d
string.value: It fetches 2,500 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: DEX Potion increases your avoidability by 5 for 3 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Increases the avoidability by 5 for 3 min.

string.name: q
string.value: Sunset Dew recovers MP 5000

string.name: d
string.value: It recovers MP 5,000.

string.name: q
string.value: Sunrise Dew recovers HP 4000.

string.name: d
string.value: It recovers MP 4,000.

string.name: q
string.value: Sunrise Dew can be sold to the stores for 4,050 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: It's sold for 4,050 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Sunset Dew can be sold to the stores for 5,050 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: It's sold for 5,100 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: Pure Water can be bought through 24 Hr Mobile Store, Jane, Valen, Hana, or Mr. Sweatbottom.

string.name: d
string.value: Hana of El Nath does NOT sell pure water.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you complete the quest of "Sera and Her Mirror" at the Maple Island, you'll gain a little bit of EXP and mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: Only EXP, not mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: During the quest of "Nina & Sen's Dinner" at the Maple Island, Sen asks for the Mushroom Soup.

string.name: d
string.value: Sen wants the Mushroom Soup.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you complete the quest of "Roger and the Apple" at the Maple Island, you'll get a watermelon from him.

string.name: d
string.value: Gives away an apple.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you complete the quest of "Deliver the Letter to the Chief" at the Maple Island, you'll gain Wooden Shield.

string.name: d
string.value: Gives away a bandana.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you complete the quest of "Biggs' Collection of Items" at the Maple Island, you'll gain a Wooden Sword.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll get either a Fruit Knife or a Razor.

string.name: q
string.value: The quest of "Fixing Blackbull's House" at Perion can only be cleared by the ones that have gone through the 1st job adv.

string.name: d
string.value: The quest can be completed even without a job adv.

string.name: q
string.value: To clear the quest of "Pia and the Blue Mushroom" at Henesys, you'll need 60 Horned Mushroom Caps and 60 Blue Mushroom Caps.

string.name: d
string.value: Not Horned Mushroom Caps, but Green Mushroom Caps.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you complete the quest of "Jane and the Wild Boar" at Lith Harbor, you'll gain a Scroll for Armor DEF.

string.name: d
string.value: Not the scroll for armor, but the scroll for weapon.

string.name: q
string.value: To clear the quest of "Alex the Runaway Kid" at Kerning City, you'll need to get a gold watch from Chief Stan and deliver it back to Alex.

string.name: d
string.value: Chief Stan is at Henesys, Alex at Kerning City.

string.name: q
string.value: The quest of "Arwen and the Glass Shoes" at Ellinia can only be completed once.

string.name: d
string.value: The "Glass Shoes" quest can be repeated over and over again.

string.name: q
string.value: To clear the quest of "Fixing Blackbull's House," you'll need 50 tree branches and 30 firewoods.

string.name: d
string.value: You need 30 tree branches and 50 firewoods.

string.name: q
string.value: The time limit for Party Quest at Kerning City is 30 min.

string.name: d
string.value: Has to be cleared within the 30 min. time limit.

string.name: q
string.value: If you're over LV. 40, even without the 2nd job adv., you'll be able to take on the quest of "Jane the Alchemist"

string.name: d
string.value: You need to have 2nd job adv. in order to take on the quest.

string.name: q
string.value: You won't be able to enter the Party Quest at Kerning City if some other party is already in there.

string.name: d
string.value: Only one party can enter the map to take on the Party Quest at a time.

string.name: q
string.value: Alex the runaway kid from Kerning City's father is Mr. Wetbottom of the VIP sauna at Sleepywood.

string.name: d
string.value: Alex's father is Chief Stan of Henesys.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you clear the quest of "John's Pink Flower Basket," you'll receive 30 screws from him as a reward.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll receive 30 screws from John.

string.name: q
string.value: Mr. Wetbottom's Secret Book is blue.

string.name: d
string.value: It's in red.

string.name: q
string.value: The ticket sold at the subway construction site for B1, B2, and B3 all cost 2,000 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: B1 - 500 mesos. B2 - 1,200 mesos. B3 - 2,000 mesos.

string.name: q
string.value: The level limit for Party Quest at Kerning City is between 20 and 30.

string.name: d
string.value: The level limit is between 21 and 30.

string.name: q
string.value: To take on the quest of "Building a New House for Blackbull," your fame level needs to be at least 5.

string.name: d
string.value: The fame level has to be at least 10.

string.name: q
string.value: Every time you clear Shumi's quest, your fame level will increase by 1, all 3 times.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll earn a total of +3 on fame level through her quests.

string.name: q
string.value: Once the quest of "Sabirtrama and the Anti-Aging Medicine" is cleared, you'll be able to gain either a Star Rock or a Moon Rock.

string.name: d
string.value: If the items are NOT of the ones Sabitrama requested, you'll get a Moon Rock instead.

string.name: q
string.value: For the quest of "Sabitrama and the Diet Medicine," the color of the flowers he asks for are the same throughout.

string.name: d
string.value: The color of flowers differ everytime you ask him.

string.name: q
string.value: The Party Quest of Kerning City consists of 5 stages.

string.name: d
string.value: You need to clear 5 stages. There's also a bonus stage available.

string.name: q
string.value: The quest of "Jane the Alchemist" asks for materials 3 different times.

string.name: d
string.value: You need to gather up the materials 3 times to clear the quest.

string.name: q
string.value: For the quest of "Sabitrama and the Diet Medicine," if you clear it without delivering the right herb, you'll just receive EXP 500.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll receive EXP 500 while clearing it.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you clear the quest of "Jane and the Wild Boar," you'll receive a random weapon attack scroll of either 100%, 60%, or 10%.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll receive EXP 500 and a 60% Scroll for Weapon Att.

string.name: q
string.value: The Forest of Patience consists of 5 levels.

string.name: d
string.value: Diet Medicine (LV 1, 2). Anti-Aging Medicine (LV 3, 4, 5)

string.name: q
string.value: Shumi's quest goes from <Lost Coin - Lots of Money - Sack of Money>

string.name: d
string.value: The 2nd quest is "Shumi and the Lost Bundle of Money"

string.name: q
string.value: The Unagi Special you'll need for Mr. Wetbottom's quests consists of Lupin Banana, Curse Eye Tail, and Pig Head.

string.name: d
string.value: Lupin Banana does NOT go in the Unagi Special.

string.name: q
string.value: The Deep Forest of Patience consists of 7 levels.

string.name: d
string.value: Deep Forest of Patience consists of 7 levels.

string.name: q
string.value: To clear the quest of "Luke the Security Guy," you'll need 100 pieces of Jr. Necki Skin, 10 Stirge Wings, and 1 Pure Water.

string.name: d
string.value: 1 Bowl of Salad, not Pure Water.

string.name: q
string.value: To clear the quest of "Rowen and the Cursed Dolls," you'll need a total of 2,300 cursed dolls.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll need 100. 200, 400, 600, and 1,000 cursed dolls per quest.

string.name: q
string.value: To reawaken the Ragged Gladius from the quest of "Manji's Ragged Gladius," you'll need the Moon Rock for it.

string.name: d
string.value: You need the Star Rock.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you clear the quest of "Building a New House for Blackbull," you'll randomly receive a 10% Scroll for Weapon Att.

string.name: d
string.value: The scrolls can be chosen according to your occupation.

string.name: q
string.value: The Deed to the Land you need to clear the quest of "Building a New House for Blackbull" can be obtained through Cold Eye.

string.name: d
string.value: The Deed can be obtained through Curse Eye.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you clear the quest of "Ronnie & the Fairies Building a New House," you'll receive EXP 4,000.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll receive EXP 3,900.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you clear the quest of "Sabitrama and the Anti-Aging Medicine," your fame level will increase by 2.

string.name: d
string.value: Your fame level will increase, along with gaining some EXP and items.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you clear the quest of "Pia's Present for a Friend," you'll receive an overall armor for Thief with the level limit of 60.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll receive a set of LV. 60 top and bottom.

string.name: q
string.value: The quest of "Trade with Sergeant Charlie" can be done regardless of the level.

string.name: d
string.value: The quest is available even to the beginners.

string.name: q
string.value: The NPC's that you need to see for the quest of "Alpha Platoon's Network of Communication" are Master Sergeant Fox, Staff Sergeant Bravo, Sergeant Charlie, and Corporal Easy.

string.name: d
string.value: They are Master Sergeant Fox, Staff Sergeant Bravo, Sergeant Charlie, and Corporal Easy.

string.name: q
string.value: For the quest of "Looking For a Book of Ancient," all users over LV. 50, regardless of the job, can take part in it.

string.name: d
string.value: All users LV. 55 and over, minus the beginners, can take part in it.

string.name: q
string.value: In order to become a Bowman, beginners need to head over to Bowman Training School.

string.name: d
string.value: The beginners can become bowmen at the Bowman Instructional School.

string.name: q
string.value: In order to become a Warrior, beginners need to head over to the Warrior Sanctuary.

string.name: d
string.value: The beginners can become Warriors at the Warrior Sanctuary.

string.name: q
string.value: In order to become a Magician, beginners need to head over to the Magic Library.

string.name: d
string.value: The beginners can become Magicians at the Magic Library.

string.name: q
string.value: The item you need to collect to make the 2nd job adv., all 30 of them, is called the Brown Crystal.

string.name: d
string.value: You need to collect 30 BLACK Crystals.

string.name: q
string.value: Once you have collected 30 Black Crystals for the 2nd job adv., you'll be awarded the "Proof of a Hero."

string.name: d
string.value: Once you have collected 30 Black Crystals for the 2nd job adv., you'll be awarded the "Proof of a Hero."

string.name: q
string.value: For the 2nd job adv., a Warrior can choose between becoming a Fighter, Page, or an Axeman.

string.name: d
string.value: You can choose between Fighter, Page, or Spearman as your 2nd job adv. as a Warrior.

string.name: q
string.value: For the 2nd job adv., a Bowman can choose between becoming a Hunter or a Sniper.

string.name: d
string.value: Hunter for the Bowman, Sniper for the crossBowman.

string.name: q
string.value: For the 2nd job adv., a Thief can choose between becoming an Assassin or a Bandit.

string.name: d
string.value: Assassin for the Thief with throwing stars, Bandit for the Thief with daggers.

string.name: q
string.value: For the 2nd job adv., a Magician can choose between becoming a Wizard or a Priest.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll be choosing either Wizard or Cleric.

string.name: q
string.value: When the beginner is at level 10, he/she can choose to become a Warrior, Magician, Thief, or a Bowman.

string.name: d
string.value: You can become a Magician at LV. 8

string.name: q
string.value: For a beginner to become a Thief, one needs to have at least LUK of 25 or over.

string.name: d
string.value: You need DEX of 25 or over.

string.name: q
string.value: To make the 3rd job adv., the user needs be at least at LV. 70 or above.

string.name: d
string.value: The 3rd job adv. will be available to users at LV 70 or over.

string.name: q
string.value: When a beginner makes the first job adv., 1 skill point is awarded.

string.name: d
string.value: When a beginner makes the job adv., 1 skill point will be awarded.

string.name: q
string.value: During the 2nd job adv., you can choose a totally different job for it (ex. Warrior → Bowman)

string.name: d
string.value: Can't change your job into something totally different.

string.name: q
string.value: To make the 4th job advancement, you'll need to be at least at LV. 120, with a 3rd job adv. under your belt.

string.name: d
string.value: The 4th job adv. will be available to the ones over LV. 120.

string.name: q
string.value: A 1st-level Magician skill, "Improving MP Recovery," goes up to level 15.

string.name: d
string.value: The skill goes up to level 16.

string.name: q
string.value: When the Spearman's skill, "Hyper Body," is fully mastered, your MaxHP and MaxMP increases by 60%.

string.name: d
string.value: If you have mastered the skill, your MaxHP & MaxMP increases 60%.

string.name: q
string.value: When the Sniper's skill, "Iron Arrow," is fully mastered, the damage will increase by 180%.

string.name: d
string.value: Once you have mastered the Iron Arrow, the damage will increase by 180%.

string.name: q
string.value: The Thief has a skill called "Lucky Seven," which enables you to throw stars in mid-air.

string.name: d
string.value: Thieves can use skills while in mid-air.

string.name: q
string.value: All 2nd-level skills, regardless of the occupation, has a total of 6 sets of skills.

string.name: d
string.value: There are 8 different sets of skills for Warriors.

string.name: q
string.value: In order to become a Bowman, beginners need to head over to Bowman Training School.

string.name: d
string.value: The beginners can become thieves at the Thieves' Hideout.

string.name: q
string.value: Magicians have 3 different types of jobs available for the 4th job adv.

string.name: d
string.value: Only Warriors have the jobs split 3 ways for the 4th job adv.

string.name: q
string.value: The order of occupation for the Bowman using the regular bow is that of [Archer → Hunter → Ranger → Bow God]

string.name: d
string.value: The job order goes like this. [Hunter→Ranger→Bowmaster].

string.name: q
string.value: The order of occupation for the Thief with dagger is that of [Rogue → Bandit → Chief Bandit → Night Lord]

string.name: d
string.value: The job order goes like this. [Rogue→Bandit→Chief Bandit→Shadower].

string.name: q
string.value: The order of occupation for the Cleric is that of [Mage → Cleric → Priest → Bishop]

string.name: d
string.value: The job order goes like this. [Magician→Cleric→Priest→Bishop].

string.name: q
string.value: Add up all the occupations for the 4th job adv., and it adds up to 9.

string.name: d
string.value: 3 for Warriors + 2 for Magicians + 2 for bowmen + 2 for thieves = 9

string.name: q
string.value: After making your new character, the first place you head over to is the [Maple Island].

string.name: d
string.value: [Maple Island] is the very first place you end up in MapleStory.

string.name: q
string.value: When creating a character, you'll be rolling a dice for the character stats. When you add up the stats for STR, DEX, INT, LUK, it'll add up to 24.

string.name: d
string.value: It's a total of 25 points.

string.name: q
string.value: The first NPC you run into in MapleStory is "Rina."

string.name: d
string.value: The first NPC you run into in MapleStory is "Heena."

string.name: q
string.value: Beginners need to pay only 100 mesos, a major discount, to use the cabs that are placed on every town on the island.

string.name: d
string.value: Beginners only need to pay 50 mesos to use the cab.

string.name: q
string.value: To purchase potions and scrolls at Kerning City, head over to "Famous Pharmacy."

string.name: d
string.value: To purchase potions at Kerning City, head over to "Famous Pharmacy."

string.name: q
string.value: In a safe town, you won't die even if your HP runs out by dropping from a high place.

string.name: d
string.value: Even in a safe town, if the HP runs out, the character will die.

string.name: q
string.value: To enter the Hidden Street, your character needs to be at least at LV. 10, with the job adv. under its belt.

string.name: d
string.value: Anyone can enter the Hidden Street.

string.name: q
string.value: The VIP Sauna at the Sleepywood Hotel costs 999 mesos to enter.

string.name: d
string.value: The VIP Sauna costs 999 mesos to enter.

string.name: q
string.value: To contact the MapleStory Hotline, dial 1588-7703

string.name: d
string.value: To contact the MapleStory Hotline, dial 1588-7703

string.name: q
string.value: The EXP points needed to level up differ from different jobs.

string.name: d
string.value: All EXP points needed for the level-up is equal to that of other jobs.

string.name: q
string.value: The EXP points awarded from the same monster differ from each time out.

string.name: d
string.value: The EXP points awarded will be the same, if it's from the same monster.

string.name: q
string.value: The NPC that sells potions at Florina Beach is named "Valen."

string.name: d
string.value: The NPC that sells potions there is "Valen."

string.name: q
string.value: You'll need EXP 15 to go from LV. 1 to LV. 2.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll need 15 points of EXP to go from LV 1 to LV 2.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll need EXP 34 to go from LV. 2 to LV. 3.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll need 34 points of EXP for that.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll need EXP 67 to go from LV. 3 to LV. 4.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll need 57 points of EXP for that.

string.name: q
string.value: Any act of dealing/trading cash points will result in heavy punishment.

string.name: d
string.value: It's against the Terms of Agreement.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll need EXP 92 to go from LV. 4 to LV. 5.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll need 92 points of EXP for that.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll need EXP 250 to go from LV. 5 to LV. 6.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll need 135 points of EXP for that.

string.name: q
string.value: You can only recharge your NexonCash through the MapleStory website or through the Cash Shop in the game.

string.name: d
string.value: It's impossible to recharge cash points at the website.

string.name: q
string.value: If you delete a cash item, you'll receive 35% of it back through MaplePoints.

string.name: d
string.value: You only receive 30% of it back.

string.name: q
string.value: All presents received through Cash Item cannot be deleted.

string.name: d
string.value: The only item that's undeletable is that of a "use" cash item.

string.name: q
string.value: You can put upto 8 items of your liking at the wish list of the Cash Shop.

string.name: d
string.value: You can put upto 10 items on wish list.

string.name: q
string.value: If you make the 2nd job adv. either at LV. 31 or beyond, you won't be able to receive the bonus SP + 1 that comes with the job adv.

string.name: d
string.value: You'll receive a bonus SP after every job adv.

string.name: q
string.value: You can buy presents for your friends using MaplePoints.

string.name: d
string.value: You can't buy presents for others with the MaplePoints.

string.name: q
string.value: The Regular Sauna at Sleepywood Hotel costs 490 mesos.

string.name: d
string.value: The Regular Sauna costs 499 mesos to enter.

string.name: q
string.value: You'll be able to choose either a sword, a bat, or an axe as your weapon when you first make the character. Out of those weapons, the axe is considered the strongest, and the slowest of the three.

string.name: d
string.value: The basic set of weapons you choose from when first creating the character may all look different, but they all consist of the same characteristics.

string.name: q
string.value: MapleStory is a 2D side-scrolling online adventure game from Nexon.

string.name: d
string.value: MapleStory is a 2D side-scrolling online adventure game from Wizet.
